hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo zypper up -y sudo zypper install -y git tar wget java-1_8_0-openjdk java-1_8_0-openjdk-devel curl
export WORK_DIR=`pwd` export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xmx2g -XX:MaxPermSize=1024m" export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.3.9/binaries/apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz tar -zxvf apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz export PATH=$WORK_DIR/apache-maven-3.3.9/bin:$PATH mvn -v
wget https://yarnpkg.com/latest.tar.gz tar zvxf latest.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:$WORK_DIR/dist/bin
git clone https://github.com/apache/zeppelin.git cd zeppelin/ git checkout v0.7.3 sed -i '47d' zeppelin-web/pom.xml sed -i '46 a \ <plugin.frontned.version>1.5</plugin.frontned.version> ' zeppelin-web/pom.xml mvn clean package -DskipTests bin/zeppelin-daemon.sh start sleep 5m curl http://localhost:8080/#/ pgrep -d" " -f "zeppelin" | sudo xargs kill || true
